title: Manufacturing Design Engineer (MDE) - Hardware Enclosures
summary: The Apple Manufacturing Design Engineer (MDE) is accountable for driving the development of key mechanical manufacturing processes across Apple’s worldwide supply base.
description: Apple MDE’s are extraordinary engineers that provide end to end manufacturing and process solutions for key design features...
key_qualifications: 3+ years of full-time mechanical manufacturing experience required. Demonstrate hands-on mechanical ability. Demonstrate excellent written and verbal interpersonal skills. 25% domestic and international travel required. Experience with highly cosmetic parts a plus as is experience in a manufacturing environment of consumer electronics or consumer plastic / sheet metal products. Be a self-starter by defining all engineering tasks to meet project objectives and have the ability to quickly learn about new processes with very little information provided.
education_experience: BS, MS or PhD in mechanical, manufacturing or industrial engineering preferred.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. The base pay range for this role is between $122,300 and $184,600, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs...
